title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for evaluating v(t) at both endpoints

1 point is earned for correct velocity value

dv dt  =24t−36  dv dt  =0 when t=  3 2 v( 0 )=15  v(   3 2 )=−12  v( 2 )=−9 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6529@

Maximum velocity is 15
descriptions:

1 point is earned for evaluating v(t) at both endpoints

1 point is earned for correct velocity value
